text: James Lee Williams (12 April 1992 â€“ 5 January 2025), known as The Vivienne, was a British drag performer, singer and actor. He was known for being the UK Drag Ambassador in 2015 for American reality television series RuPaul's Drag Race. Hed won the first series of RuPaul's Drag Race UK in 2019. He became the first drag performer to compete on Dancing on Ice in 2023. He starred as the Wicked Witch of the West for The Wizard of Oz in the 2024 UK tour. Williams died at his home in Chorlton-by-Backford, Cheshire on 5 January 2025 at the age of 32. ==References== ==Other websites== *The Vivienne on the IMDb Category:1992 births Category:2025 deaths Category:LGBT actors Category:Welsh stage actors Category:Drag queens Category:Reality show winners Category:Welsh singers
title: The Vivienne
